event.description: Derek Jeter singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis.
Johnny Damon strikes out swinging.
Mark Teixeira pops out to catcher Gregg Zaun.
With Alex Rodriguez batting, Derek Jeter steals (7) 2nd base.
Alex Rodriguez pops out to shortstop Cesar Izturis.
Hideki Matsui flies out to right fielder Nick Markakis.
Nick Swisher walks.
Robinson Cano grounds into a double play, shortstop Cesar Izturis to first baseman Aubrey Huff. Nick Swisher out at 2nd.
Melky Cabrera pops out to third baseman Melvin Mora in foul territory.
Francisco Cervelli lines out to third baseman Melvin Mora.
Derek Jeter walks.
Johnny Damon grounds out, second baseman Brian Roberts to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Mark Teixeira walks.
Alex Rodriguez walks. Mark Teixeira to 2nd.
Hideki Matsui walks. Mark Teixeira to 3rd. Alex Rodriguez to 2nd.
Nick Swisher out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Luis Montanez. Mark Teixeira scores.
Robinson Cano grounds into a double play, second baseman Brian Roberts to shortstop Cesar Izturis to first baseman Aubrey Huff. Hideki Matsui out at 2nd.
Melky Cabrera doubles (3) on a line drive to left fielder Luis Montanez.
Francisco Cervelli pops out to second baseman Brian Roberts.
Derek Jeter grounds out, shortstop Cesar Izturis to first baseman Aubrey Huff. Melky Cabrera to 3rd.
Johnny Damon homers (8) on a fly ball to right field. Melky Cabrera scores.
Mark Teixeira homers (6) on a fly ball to right field.
Alex Rodriguez flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.
Pitching Change: Danys Baez replaces Adam Eaton.
Hideki Matsui grounds out, pitcher Danys Baez to first baseman Aubrey Huff.

Cesar Izturis hit by pitch.
Brian Roberts out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Nick Swisher. Luis Montanez scores. Gregg Zaun to 3rd.
With Adam Jones batting, Cesar Izturis steals (6) 2nd base, Cesar Izturis to 3rd. Wild pitch by pitcher Phil Hughes. Gregg Zaun scores. Cesar Izturis to 3rd.
Adam Jones doubles (12) on a line drive to left fielder Johnny Damon. Cesar Izturis scores.
Nick Markakis singles on a sharp ground ball to first baseman Mark Teixeira. Adam Jones to 3rd.
Aubrey Huff homers (5) on a fly ball to right field. Adam Jones scores. Nick Markakis scores.
